feed.title: ATNPGO
feed.subtitle: Semicoherent ramblings of a vaguely sapient humanoid.

entry.title: A new way to view images-only subs

link.title: A new way to view images-only subs

entry.content:
A new link should be available in the header titled ‘r/Gallery’. This is a gallery view for the /r/ site. Just enter the name of the sub you’d like to view and browse at ease.

The software is a bit rough but it was built entirely during free time…

r/Gallery
entry.summary: A new link should be available in the header titled ‘r/Gallery’. This is a gallery view for the /r/ site. Just enter the name of the sub you’d like to view and browse at ease.

entry.title: Introducing jQuery.MobileScheduler
entry.content:
I am happy to announce the release of jQuery.MobileScheduler. After scouring the web searching for a component that would meet our needs and coming back empty handed, I’ve decided to implement my own and received approval to open-source it. Tested on both iOS and Android through Cordova, the instantiation should be extremely straightforward.

You may learn more information by visiting the project’s page or view an interactive demo on your mobile device.
entry.summary: I am happy to announce the release of jQuery.MobileScheduler.
